about_the_game:
Winter night, a boy saved the girl in danger.
One day, the boy asked the girl. What is your dream?
"I want to be a pianist."
The girl with the nine fingers said so.

The boy struggles to save the girl.
The boy does his best to protect the girl who is not protected by law, but the reality is not so good.

Can a boy protect the girl?
Can they keep their dreams to the end?

▶Feature◀

  • Tears - "Nine, ten" is a visual novel that tells the story of a girl with nine fingers and a boy with ten fingers
  • Renewed and added all character and event CGs
  • 2 Multiple Endings
  • Added New Scenario
  • Added Extra Scenario, playable after all Endings finished
  • The majority of reviews are "Thanks for making this game"

Team DTR is developing games, wishing the world to be a better place.

One day, the boy asked the girl. What is your dream?
"I want to be a pianist."
The girl with the nine fingers said so.

The boy struggles to save the girl.
The boy does his best to protect the girl who is not protected by law, but the reality is not so good.

Can a boy protect the girl?

name: Tears - 9, 10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews:
“Seriously, it's a very touching story. If you're reading this and trying to determine if it's worth spending a mere $.99 on, just get it for chrissakes. Chances are, you'll never forget it for the rest of your life. If you have a heart, it's a very impacting experience. And to Team Dream to Reality: thank you for bringing this visual novel to the US App store. I and many others truly appreciate it! Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.”
U.S.A Appstore User review 1

“This visual novel tries to move your heart by taking a cliche about never giving up and turning it into something more, something that pierces your heart.”
U.S.A Appstore User review 2

“A very touching visual novel. Short but plot rich at the same time. I like the ending and how its keeping it real, the visual novel is great and it has good art too. Recommended for every VN lover!”
Nova Agency
short_description: Can you protect this girl until the end, when the world has turned their back on her?
